availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married Mary Scholl. Father of Almazar Scholl, Mary Scholl, Elizabeth Scholl and Landon C. Scholl. Druggist in Estill County in 1860. Physician in Estill County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 278.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 558B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Estill County, KY, July1863, p. 146 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Dr Daniel Boone “D.B” Scholl (1818-1891)," Memorial #124014468, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/124014468 (accessed December 12, 2018).
